game.name: Abyssal Fish
game.description:
You are left in a sea where a number of terrifying creatures along with the deadly trees and plants dwell. The problem is that the environment is filled up with full of silence and matchless darkness. You are playing the role of a scary abyss fish, which is in a quest for some food. Are you ready to accept this challenge? Join Abyssal Fish game and show the world that you have an amazing skill to guide a lovely fish! Do not worry you will be welcomed here with some bright fishes to make your day!! 
Your objective in this cool adventure game is to guide fish to find her next meat. Be alert and try to move this aquatic animal upward and downward to save her life! Avoid obstacles and build a successful ocean sanctuary filled with a wonderful aquatic life! It will be wonderful to enjoy the calming sounds of the ocean. You would not forget the song echoed by the whale in a distant reef. There are hundreds of fish to grab which you can bring to your aquarium in this free online escaping game.
Customize your underwater oasis with seaweed, corals and rocks! You also have an option to catch ugly and small fishes to eat in this one of the best underwater simulation games! Put your quick reflexes skills to challenge to discover your way towards a better world! This relaxing family simulator mobile game will take you to a matchless marine life. Try to cover as much distance as you can to score higher and become a champion in a fish simulator game!
